name: starwars-guide
description: Star Wars fan site featuring The Ultimate Star Wars Timeline, SWordle word game, HyperPanels comics, and Star Wars news and updates

scripts.start: npm run build:css && open http://localhost:4000 && bundle exec jekyll serve --watch
scripts.dev: npm run build:css && bundle exec jekyll serve --watch
scripts.build: npm run build:css && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.bundle_build: npm run build:css-prod && bundle exec jekyll build && open http://localhost:8080 && npx http-server ./_site
